[{"id":"dev-17441","entityId":"86-22988","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] [Add Gift] Quantities in cart are misleading"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Igor Dyachenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1582633727924"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17441"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
Product ID116042
Account emailMoen-hhu6p377@gmail.com
Order #1582629619041747100
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

There is a follow up ticket to fix minor issues during implemented flow
Preconditions: 2 offers are created. Bundle of the offers is created with enabled Gift option.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Open ticketshop https://audrey-hhu6p377.regiondo-test-uk.de/ and on the bundle detail page;
  2. Choose "Buy as a gift" tab and Set Quantity to 3 items;
  3. Enable "1 Gift certificate valid for 3 people" option. Add the bundle to cart and open the cart;

Actual result:

A- Gift voucher
1 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
1 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Quantity: 1 × €465.00 instead of 3

B- After adding bundle to cart, popup display
Incredible Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 1
22222 Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 1

Expected result:

A - Gift voucher should be
3 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
3 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Gift voucher
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

B- popup should display
Incredible Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 3
22222 Wooden Table (test1)
default - Adults 3

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"i.dyachenko"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1583410520210"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-15988","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":{"bg":"#e0f1fb","fg":"#3d85c6"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["All"],"valueId":["All"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"},{"value":"First sprint","id":"Zulu Scrum Board:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"BundleGiftQty.png","id":"89-66901","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/BundleGiftQty.png?file=89-66901&c=true"},{"value":"redeemGift.png","id":"89-66902","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/redeemGift.png?file=89-66902&c=true"},{"value":"GiftConfirmation.png","id":"89-66903","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/GiftConfirmation.png?file=89-66903&c=true"},{"value":"image.png","id":"89-66949","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-66949&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-66950","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-66950&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-66412","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-17441","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Walid Dechri, @Alexander Bechte , @Igor Dyachenko

A- Gift voucher

1 × test1 - Incredible Wooden Table - Adults
1 × test1 - 22222 Wooden Table - Adults
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

Here the first two rows show how many respective products are in a bundle.
And the third row shows how many gift certificates person is buying.

So if the bundle consists, let's say, from 2 items of product A and 3 items of product B, then it will be:

2 × Product A
3 × Product B
Quantity: 1 × €465.00

If you buy two bundles, the whole purchase would consist of 4 products A and 6 products B.

Please suggest if it is important to show:

  • Quantities of products composing one bundle
  • Total quantities of final products purchased
  • Number of gift certificates.

As an example please consider the following use cases:
Bundle:

  • 2 × Product A

  • 3 × Product B

  • I am buying 2 bundles as 1 gift certificate.

  • I am buying 2 bundles as 2 gift certificates.

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
:
-------:
Product ID116042
Account emailMoen-hhu6p377@gmail.com
Order #1582629619041747100
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106


#### Steps to reproduce:
1. Book the bundle gift and open PDF; (Booking number 1582629619041747100 )
2. Redeem the gift voucher using code and URL from the PDF;


#### Actual result:
1. Redeem gift certificate page does not have info about quantity
2. Black box with Bundle title is clickable without any interaction


#### Expected result:
1. Add quantity to section with offers

URLhttps://themorningstarcompany.regiondo.de/sternenregen-in-sternstadt-1-pers
Product ID76271
Account emailaline.morgenstern@regiondo.com, bordt@jochen-schweizer.de
Supplier ID21511, 10199
Novomind Ticket ID69263, 86154
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Log in to dashboard with aline.morgenstern@regiondo.com

  2. Go to calendar and check connected resources to offer Sternenregen and how many spots there are available for Dec 19 8:00. There are 8 spots available for sale according to resources.

  3. Then go to offer in ticketshop and check the availability that shows on mouse-over for Dec 19 8:00 for Sternenregen: https://themorningstarcompany.regiondo.de/sternenregen-in-sternstadt-1-pers.

Actual result:

When resources are connected to the offer, availability in frontend shows incorrectly. It says that 16 tickets are available even though only 8 are available.

Seems like the system calculates availability like this : availability for option X (=8) + availability for option Y (=8) = total availability.
But here, the same resource is used for both options, so availability should not be added.
FYI:

  • actual availability when choosing amount of tickets is shown correctly:
  • Also: When no resources are used in the offer, ticket availabillities show correctly in ticketshop (therefore problem must be connected to resources)

Expected result:

Availabilities should show correctly in frontend taking into account the resources that are available.

Chorny","issueId":"dev-17016","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Bogdan Cumpanasu
Can you please check if you can reproduce?
For me, when I create resource with limited quantity and assign it to product, I see correct quantity.
Maybe it is related to this setting for a resource: "Availability cannot be shared between products"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1582712238514,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66237","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-17016","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on live with aline.morgenstern@regiondo.com

  1. Case one when availability of resource cannot be shared between products - no issue ✓

    Product 'Sternenfahrt', id 111142. It has 9 available spots, as per resource calendar, on 29th of feb, at 09:00:

Went on product's page - attached a screencast, but I wasn't able to reproduce it, correct functionality. - video is called 'no_issue'.

  1. Case 2 when availability of resource can be shared between products - no issue ✓

    Product 'Sternenfahrt', id 111142. It has 9 available spots, as per resource calendar, on 29th of feb, at 09:00.
    Went on product's page - attached a screencast, but I wasn't able to reproduce it, correct functionality. - video is called 'no_issue2'.

I wasn't able to reproduce it

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583331028775,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66414","author":"Edon_Kafexholli","authorFullName":"Edon Kafexholli","issueId":"dev-17016","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Sergey Chorny
Jochen Schweizer Arena (ID: 10199) reported the same issue:

Offer "Indoor Surfen" (ID: 22716), ticket category: "Fortgeschritten"

    1. March 2020, 21:15 --> 6/12 resources consumed

  • booking widget on https://www.jochen-schweizer-arena.de/indoor-surfen/ --> the "mouse-over" shows 10 left

    but only 6 can be booked

This issue happens when the event-capacity and the free resources are different. The booking widget always takes the event capacity instead of the resource. In this case the event-capacity is 10 but the free resources are 6

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583331794769,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-66441","author":"walid.dechri","authorFullName":"Walid Dechri","issueId":"dev-17016","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei this ticket was removed from the board and included in the next release, could we somehow start it ?

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/availabilities
resources affectedInflate, Sprungbereich
Account emailinfo@maxxarena.de
Supplier ID18047
Novomind Ticket ID81170
Environmentall browsers

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Log in to bernhard@maxxarena.com

  2. Go to resource manager and check number of resources. There are 6 resources.
    ->

  3. Check if all resources are connected to offers.
    -> all resources are connected to offers

  4. Go to Calendar > Resource view

Actual result:

Some users of this supplier ID cannot see some of the resources in resource view while others can see all of them.

Userresource not shown
info@maxxarena.de-
adam@estermanns.com-
bernhard@maxxarena.comInflate
christina@estermanns.com-
daniel@estermanns.com-
franziska@estermanns.comInflate
herbert@estermanns.com-
julian@estermanns.com-
layla@estermanns.com-
marinus@estermanns.comSprungbereich
rico@clubdrei.com-
simone@estermanns.com-
staff@maxxarena.com-
vivian@estermanns.com-

example info@maxxarena.de where everything works

example bernhard@maxxarena.com where the resource "Inflate" is not shown

Info: we tried to reproduce but weren't able to reproduce on other accounts.
Missing resources can still be accessed manually via filter.
After adding all resources to filter, and afterwards delete one resource from filter, resource "Inflatable" is shown in resource table (see Screencast)

Expected result:

All resources should be shown per default in resource view in all user accounts when they are connected to at least one offer. E.g.

-------:
Product ID116042
Account emailMoen-hhu6p377@gmail.com
Order #1582629619041747100
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

#### Step to reproduce :
1- book 3 gift certificate for Bundle offer (choose option 1 gift certificate valid for 3 pep ) Booking number 1582629619041747100

#### Actual result:
There is no offer title displayed.


#### Expected result:
Offer title should be displayed instead of "default"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1583324635776,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret
